It has been mentioned several times since the opening, but tomorrow, August 24, Tsubaki Factory's Summer Festival 2023

The live performance called "Burning Heat" will be held tomorrow, August 24th. The live performance called "Burning Heat" is an event that we would like to make an annual event where you can really enjoy the summer festival with us in the future.
This year's event will be more festive than last year's.
I think it will be even more summery and fun to enjoy the festival together.
Last year, we had fireworks and yukata (summer kimono), and we did all kinds of summer-related activities at the course.
This year, we may do something more summery than that,

This year, we may do something more summery than that, or we may do something that was popular last year,This year, we may do something more summery, or we may do something that was popular last year, or we may do something that we are really looking forward to and think about the set list a little bit.
We'll also have a chance to think about the set list, and we'll be able to design costumes for each of you.
It's a live performance that we create by ourselves, and we are very particular about a lot of things.
You can see how we did it on the following page.You can watch it on our sub-channel
